title: CDR AP ratios
body: Using transcendence which reads "Per 1% excess CDR, you get 2 AP" Paraphrasing. Yet when i have 10% excess I only get 19.  I'm trying to play by the numbers here, but the maths just ain't adding up.

replies.body: Rounding is an odd beast, probably a float to integer cast somewhere, even just in the UI.
